signals.book.description: Signals is a space-based resource generation mod focused on detecting signals from outer planets and investigating them for loot.
signals.book.title: Signals And You
signals.signal.basic1_description: A nearby asteroid. Downloads very quickly.
signals.signal.basic2_description: A distant exoplanet. Slow download speed.
tooltip.signals.exo_mining_station_descr: A station in charge of sending exo-miner drones to harvest valuable resources from outer space.
tooltip.signals.signal_locator_descripti: Stores a signal's coordinates onto a tape, allowing satellites to begin downloading it.
tooltip.signals.signal_terminal_descript: A satellite terminal that allows the user to download extraterrestrial signals and store them onto tapes.
